name: MyC (bloomingbridges)
description:
Did you know that mushrooms had their own biochemical computing interface? Their own version of the metaverse, long before we coined the term? That they enjoyed watching our  soap operas? Now you know..

Though something has shook the community to the core a few days ago. You'll have to investigate what happened by jacking into the mycelium network and navigating a familiar computing metaphor in mushroom language. 

My entry for the first luxe jam ( theme: plants x technology )

=== DISCLAIMER: Sadly this game isn't actually "playable" yet. I hope to work some more on it later in the week ===

Soundtrack by FlashX
